0: The view as you walk in is beautiful
Given a chilled Proseco on check in and absolutely blown away by the lobby bar area and outside pool area with beautiful cabanas
Overall a good experience despite a check out surprise
Overall a good stay opinion in Santa Monica
Stayed 3 nights in 2 interconnecting rooms spacious clean fresh
excellent property all round breakfast was exceptional
Service and staff were all excellent and friendly from arrival to departure
Smart interconnecting rooms which are great for families
1: I travel a lot and at this price point two nights for 110
The upgrade room was next to the service elevator which I was told did not operate between 10 pm and 8 am
And they needed to sort something else out and to be fair they did
For such value no free breakfast was provided
do not offer a service that you are not able to provide
The two receptionists who looked at each other laughing and openly mocking me when I left Change jobs you guys are pathetic
The pool area is small with limited seating
We stayed previously at the Viceroy in Cabo which was amazing and this was overpriced and a big let down
Once clever rehab and decor that is now a bit old
I was notified there is no amenities available at the moment upon arrival which I understood and am fine with
